verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1697>concerning<s%> the <S%H1226>drought<s%>.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> <S%H56>mourneth<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof <S%H535>languish<s%>, they sit in <S%H6937>black<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>; and the <S%H6682>cry<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is gone <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And their <S%H117>nobles<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> their little <S%H6810>ones<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: they <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1356>cisterns<s%>, and <S%H4672>find<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>; they <S%H7725>return<s%> with their <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H7387>empty<s%>; they are put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> and <S%H954>confounded<s%>, and <S%H2645>cover<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

Because of the <S%H127>ground<s%> which is <S%H2865>cracked<s%>, for that no <S%H1653>rain<s%> hath been in the <S%H776>land<s%>, the <S%H406>plowmen<s%> are put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, they <S%H2645>cover<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.
Yea <S%H365><s%>, the hind also in the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3205>calveth<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> her <S%H1877>young<s%>, because there is no grass.

And the wild <S%H6501>asses<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> on the bare <S%H8205>heights<s%>, they <S%H7602>pant<s%> for <S%H7307>air<s%> like <S%H8577>jackals<s%>; their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%>, because there is no <S%H6212>herbage<s%>.

Though our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against <S%H6213>us<s%>, work thou for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H3068>sake<s%>, O Jehovah; for our <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> are <S%H7231>many<s%>; we have sinned against <S%H2398>thee<s%>.

O thou <S%H4723>hope<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H3467>Saviour<s%> thereof in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, why shouldest thou be as a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and as a wayfaring <S%H732>man<s%> that turneth <S%H5186>aside<s%> to tarry for a <S%H3885>night<s%>?

Why shouldest thou be as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1724>affrighted<s%>, as a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> that <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%>? yet <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, art in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7121>us<s%>, and we are called by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>; leave us <S%H3240>not<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto this <S%H5971>people<s%>, Even so have they <S%H157>loved<s%> to <S%H5128>wander<s%>; they have not <S%H2820>refrained<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>: therefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> doth not <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H2142>them<s%>; now will he remember their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6419>me<s%>, Pray not for this <S%H5971>people<s%> for their <S%H2896>good<s%>.

When they <S%H6684>fast<s%>, I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> their <S%H7440>cry<s%>; and when they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>, I will not <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H3615>them<s%>; but I will consume them by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H162>I<s%>, Ah, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>! <S%H5030>behold<s%>, the prophets <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, Ye shall not see the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, neither shall ye have <S%H7458>famine<s%>; but I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H571>assured<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

Then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5030>me<s%>, The prophets <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>; I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H6680>not<s%>, neither have I commanded <S%H1696>them<s%>, neither spake I unto <S%H5012>them<s%>: they prophesy unto you a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%>, and <S%H7081>divination<s%>, and a thing of <S%H457>nought<s%>, and the <S%H8649>deceit<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> concerning the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H559>not<s%>, yet they say, <S%H2719>Sword<s%> and <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall not be in this <S%H776>land<s%>: By <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall those <S%H5030>prophets<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> to whom they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> shall be cast <S%H7993>out<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7458>famine<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and they shall have none to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H1992>them<s%>â€”them, their <S%H802>wives<s%>, nor their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, nor their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: for I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> their wickedness upon <S%H7451>them<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H5869>them<s%>, Let mine eyes run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3119>day<s%>, and let them not <S%H1820>cease<s%>; for the <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>breach<s%>, with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2470>grievous<s%> <S%H4347>wound<s%>.

If I go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H2491>then<s%>, behold, the slain with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>! and if I <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H8463>then<s%>, behold, they that are sick with <S%H7458>famine<s%>! for both the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> go <S%H5503>about<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%>.

Hast thou <S%H3988>utterly<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? hath thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>loathed<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>? why hast thou <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H4832>us<s%>, and there is no healing for <S%H6960>us<s%>? We looked for <S%H7965>peace<s%>, but no <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6256>came<s%>; and for a time of <S%H4832>healing<s%>, <S%H1205>and<s%>, behold, dismay!
We <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, our <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, and the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>; for we have sinned against <S%H2398>thee<s%>.

Do not <S%H5006>abhor<s%> <S%H8034>us<s%>, for thy name's <S%H5034>sake<s%>; do not disgrace the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>: <S%H2142>remember<s%>, <S%H6565>break<s%> not thy covenant with <S%H1285>us<s%>.

Are <S%H3426>there<s%> any among the <S%H1892>vanities<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that can cause <S%H1652>rain<s%>? or can the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7241>showers<s%>? art not thou <S%H3068>he<s%>, O Jehovah our <S%H430>God<s%>? therefore we will <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H6213>thee<s%>; for thou hast made all these things.
